pkgmetadata.longdescription: Constructing Dynamic Networks for Time-Series Data // Implements the method in Behrouzi, Abegaz, and Wit (2018) arXiv:1805.09840 to learn intra-time and inter-time conditional independence networks for ordinal time-series data and mixed discrete-and- continuous time-series data. This package assumes a stationary process, where both instantaneous and dynamic networks stay fixed over time.
